title: Teary Tales
description: Bedtime stories for kids, written by kids. From misplaced memories to bittersweet goodbyes, tender tales from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
itunes:subtitle: Tender tales from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
